players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Diana: "I am the mafioso and I killed Bob last night. Keep an eye on Charlie, as he seems suspicious."
Charlie: " I think Diana is the mafioso, but we should also keep an eye on Alice. We can't be too sure about anyone yet."
